Xen Hypervisor
UnderHost, provide the industry-leading virtualization software on the market today designed to isolated virtual environments on a single physical server and OS instance. Compared to other virtualization technologies, Xen hypervisor provides excellent segregation of VPSs to guarantee you the resources you purchase and offers the highest levels of density, performance and manageability.
